alert.note: Alert for Austin; Fort Bend; Grimes; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 14 at 3:10PM CDT until May 19 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following areas, Austin, Brazoria Islands, Coastal Brazoria, Coastal Galveston, Coastal Harris, Fort Bend, Galveston Island, Grimes, Inland Brazoria, Inland Galveston, Inland Harris, Montgomery and Waller. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall totals of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts are possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Fort Bend; Grimes; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller
